description: 1-Din 7" TFT HD Touchscreen Multimedia Source Unit plays your favorite DVD's, MP4, DIVX, & XVID movies, or MP3 audio files from a DVD-R/RW or CD-R/RW discs. Read up to a 16gb USB and SDHC cards for MP3 audio and MP4 video playback, or view & save photos with the JPG photo viewer. Built-in Blue Tooth 2.0 allows you to safely make and receive hands-free phone calls, scroll contacts lists, and stream MP3's via A2DP from your enabled Smartphone. External Microphone Included. Bluetooth V2.0 Features Noise & Echo Cancellation Contacts/Address Book Transfer, Caller ID from Contacts/Address Book, Recent Calls & Talk Time Logs, A2DP for Wireless MP3 Playback. You'll find separate front, rear, subwoofer, and line-level RCA pre-amp outputs on the back of PD-712B, all 2V max. Connect the audio output (3.5mm plug) of an auxiliary device like MP3 player or handheld game console for playback through the entire audio system. You'll find navigating through the extensive features of PD-712B an ease with a tap of the screen to access all menus and settings. Theft Deterrent Detachable Faceplate, ID3 Tag Reading, Rear View Camera Input with Trigger, Extended Sleeve & Trim Ring Included, Fixed 80Hz Subwoofer Output, 52w x 4 MOSFET Speaker Outputs, 800x480 Widescreen Resolution, 400 NIT LED Brightness
title: Power Acoustik PD-710B Single-DIN Multimedia Source with Detachable 7-Inch Oversize LCD Touchscreen including Bluetooth 2.0
